column2: "M’akoma ruhur asɛmpa bu do: Medze m’asɛm yi ma ɔhen: Me tɛkyerɛma yɛ dɛ kyerɛwfo a ne nsa ho yɛ har ne kyerɛwdua."
"Wo ho yɛ fɛw sen nyimpa mba
column3: Wɔdze enyimnyam ahyɛ w’ano; Dɛm ntsi Nyankopɔn ehyira wo daa no."

column2: "Na nam wo tumdzi mu tutu kɔ kan dwudwoodwo
column3: Wɔ nokwar na ahobrɛadze na tsenenee ntsi; Na wo nsa enyimfa nkyerɛkyerɛ wo adze a ɔyɛ hu."

column2: "W’egyen menaba ano yɛ ndam dɛ; Aman hwehwe w’enyim ase; Wɔawowɔ ɔhen atamfo akoma mu."
"W’ahengua yɛ Nyankopɔn ahengua: W’ahendzi ahempoma yɛ tsenenee ahempoma."

column3: na ekyir emumuyɛ: Dɛm ntsi na Nyankopɔn
column5: Dze enyigye ngo asera wo asen w’asɛfo."

column3: alɔe na keesia hua; Nsankutsen fi asombɛn aban no mu bɛma w’enyi agye."

column2: "Ahemfo mbabaa fora wo mbaa enyimnyamfo mu: Ɔhembaa no gyina w’abanyimfa wɔ Ofir sika mu."

column5: na yɛ aso; Eso mma wo werɛ mmfir wankasa wo man

column2: "Nna ɔhen kɔn bɔdɔ w’ahoɔfɛw: Na ɔno nye wo wura; na som no."
"Na Taere babaa dze akyɛdze bɛba hɔ; Aman mu ahonyafo mpo bɛserɛ w’enyimtsewee."
"Ɔhen ne babaa yɛ onyimnyamfo koraa wɔ ahemfie ɔdan mu: N’efuradze wɔdze sika awen mu."
"Ɔhyɛ awen ntar na wɔdze no bɛbrɛ ɔhen: N’asɛfo mbaabun no a wodzi n’ekyir no Wɔdze hɔn bɛbrɛ wo."
"Wɔdze enyigye na ehurusi dze hɔn bɛba: Wɔbɛhɛn ɔhen ne fie mu."
"Wo mba bedzi w’egyanom ananmu; Hɔn na edze hɔn bɛyɛ asaase nyinara do asafohemfo."
"Mebɛma wɔakaa wo dzin wɔ mbasantsen nyinara mu: Dɛm ntsi aman bɛda wo ase daa daa."
